newsitem.title: GERMANY: Comdex to take Internet fair to Germany next year.
newsitem.headline: Comdex to take Internet fair to Germany next year.

text.p: The sponsors of the hugely popular Comdex information technology trade fairs said on Monday that they will bring their bandwagons and digital side-shows to Germany's financial capital next year to talk up the Internet.

Comdex, which grew from a gathering of devoted followers in the early days of the personal computer to the industry's most important event, will host an Internet fair in Frankfurt from October 7-10 called Comdex Internet '97.
Comdex Internet will be held simultaneously with Object World Frankfurt '97, a trade fair dealing with so-called object-oriented software for business applications.

The event will consist of two conferences focussing on business use of the Internet global computer network and a joint exhibition of the latest in information technology and enterprise software applications.
It will be sponsored by Softbank Comdex Inc, sponsor of some 40 information technology fairs worldwide every year, and take place at the Sheraton Conference Centre in Frankfurt.
Detailed information about the event can be found on the World Wide Web at http://www.ltt.de.
